headline: Charlton Athletic Women sign Atlanta Primus on loan
summary: Charlton Athletic have signed midfielder Atlanta Primus from Barclays Women’s Championship rivals Southampton. She joins the Addicks on a season-long loan, after making 14 appearances for the Saints last term. The 27-year-old Jamaican international was […]
